column17: The attack took place at the residence of a police officer in Valencia, Sangre Grande Regional Corporation, Trinidad and Tobago.
column18: 07/10/2010: On Saturday night at 0200, in Valencia, Sangre Grande Regional Corporation, Trinidad and Tobago, a police officer's home was firebombed, damaging the residence. Investigators believe a Molotov Cocktail was used in the attack. There were no reported casualties and no group claimed responsibility.

column64: The specific motive for the attack is unknown.
column97: A Molotov cocktail was used in the attack.
column108: The residence was damaged in the attack.
